body.name: Horynar Propane Stove 2 Burner Propane Gas Stove Auto Ignition Portable Gas Stove 26000 BTU Propane Burners LPG with CSA Hose for Outdoor Cooking

features: STYLISH & WELL MADE -The surface of the propane gas stove is made of high-grade tempered glass.The propane burner is designed with integral thickened steel.Strong and durable. The look and feel are very good.Propane cooktop is a beautiful scenery for outdoor activities.
CSA HOSE & VERY MONEY SAVING - Horynar propane stove 2 burner with 5FT propane adapter Hose. CSA group. Safe and secure, Very money saving .

AUTOMATIC PIEZOELECTRIC LGNITION - Propane camping stove not uses lighters and matches to ignite.Automatically ignite the flame stoves.The gas burners for cooking outdoor are simpler. Portable propane stove only for LPG(Fuel not included)

NON-SLIP SMALL RING- Small pot on other burner ring slide easily.Very dangerous.Our propane gas stove extra small ring,It is very safe for you to use a milk pot of at least 3.5 inches, or you can use a small teapot.Enjoy the joy of delicious coffee.

HIGH HEAT OUTPUT - Camping stove propane portable up to 26000 BTU / 2 burner.The outdoor propane burner adopts 360° oxygen intake. Full burn.Can quickly heat food and water.Make your cooking very efficient.Estufas electricas de cocina is the best choice for emergency.

EXPLOSION-PROOF GLASS -The portable gas stove glass is very hard after 2 times up to 1472°F,Easy to clean.Gas stove glass is made of 4 layers of material,It has good anti-explosion performance.Propane burners are very safe, You can use them with confidence.
NOTE - Propane stove 2 burner only for LPG(Fuel not included). If you are any question with our outdoor gas stove . Please contact us or Amazon customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Thank you for your attention to our propane stove.Provide you with exquisite life.Make your life more convenient. Propane stove 2 burner only for LPG(Fuel not included) HORYNAR Propane stove 2 burner comes from the world's stove manufacturing center.Each propane stove has undergone rigorous functional testing before leaving the factory.Our expertise can provide you with high-quality products.Add more fun of your life. Note: When you open the box, look at the bottom of the stove,The 3 rings are tied to the bottom of the stove.Note: Install 4 foot pads before use.

Q: Can I use a high pressure valve? A:No.High pressure valves are prohibited,Please use our CSA low pressure valve hose.Propane burner only for LPG(Fuel not included) Q: Why doesn't my new stove ignite? A:New gas stove or long time unused.Gas stoves may take 7 or more times to ignite. Because the gas hose filled with air. NOTE 1 : Keep hands and face away from the burner during ignition.(Repeated ignition will cause the flame to shoot up suddenly)NOTE 2 : When you open the box, look at the bottom of the stove,The 3 rings are tied to the bottom of the stove.NOTE 3 : Install 4 foot pads before use.

Value set &Save money Our propane stove 2 burner includes 5 FT propane adapter hose, non-slip small ring, spare switches, gadgets and more,value set ,Very money saving . CSA propane converter regulator included CSA propane connector is tested. No leakage guaranteed. You can use our propane gas stove with confidence.The 2 burner propane stove is only for LPG tank(Fuel not included). Great for a variety of cooking utensils Other burners small pots slide easily.The additional small stove rack allows you to use a 3.5-inch milk pot very safely, or you can use a small teapot.Great for all kinds of cookware.
Very easy to clean The monolithic glass panel makes it very easy for you to clean.NOTE : When you open the box, look at the bottom of the stove,The 3 rings are tied to the bottom of the stove.

Product details : 1 High heat output The 26000BTU / 2 burner heats food and water quickly. 2 Excellent workmanship Propane stove uses high-quality materials,No burrs ,Will not cut fingers. 3 Nice mirror glass Gas stove glass is made of 4 layers of material,It has good anti-explosion performance. 4 Automatic piezoelectric ignition Propane camping stove not uses lighters and matches to ignite.Automatically ignite the flame stoves.The gas burners for cooking outdoor are simpler. 5 Anti-slip foot pads The 4 foot pads of the gas stove are made of high-quality rubber.Make the stove more stable. Don't worry about sliding while camping outdoors. Install 4 foot pads before use. 6 QCC-1 type converter The propane stove connectors are QCC-1 type.Connected to CSA hose,Very easy to install.

The best choice for outdoor lovers. Our camping stove 2 burner is a good helper for your cooking.Propane burner is the best choice for your Family gathering, BBQ, Travel, Emergency preparation. Let your family and friends enjoy a good life. · Product : TS-03 Gas Stove · Color : Black · Fuel Type : LPG (Only) · Material : Glass and alloy steel · Item Dimensions : 26.4” X 14.5’’ X 7.1’’ · Item Weight : 16.3 Pounds · Maximum Energy Output : 26000 BTU · Ignition Method : Automatic Piezoelectric Ignition

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, quiet, easily adjustable flame, propane stove
reviews.reviewText: Well worth the cost. Professionally made. Great support. I would find it very hard to consider another brand after buying this. Great for my RV. I would say it will last for years with careful proper usage. I have bought 4 other portable camping stoves in the last 5 years and this is the best by far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great propane stove
reviews.reviewText: Great propane stove has low mode and in between all the way up to high mode produces good amount of heat for cooking very very pleased and a great value all together. Well packaged

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have
reviews.reviewText: I live in Clarksville TN in an area where electricity goes out every time there is a storm. I don’t know why I didn’t think of getting this stove sooner but it’s a must have for people like me who have electric stovetops. It’s great for both indoor and outdoor cooking. I have seen flimsy but this stove is sturdy and well put together. It comes with extra knobs a piece for small pots and pans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best one so far!
reviews.reviewText: I have to say I have returned 4 different stoves brands because they were garbage and one caught fire and burn my left hand.This one however has a surprisingly well built quality and the flames are perfect, no gas leak and I tested the connections with a gas leak detector. Great product I strongly recommend this stove over any other…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my outdoor needs!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the table in Amazon and it’s 48 long x 30 width. The burners looks sturdy and large enough for big pots. Happy with my purchase so far.Hopefully this review is helpful 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: Good product overall. Enough heat for household cooking and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is useful
reviews.reviewText: I placed this burner on my patio outdoors because sometimes I will cook food on my patio, and this burner is useful there. It is easy to connect this burner to a regular gas tank, and this package includes all the required accessories to get it started. It provides decent burning power for me, and it is useful for me to cook food outdoors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent elegant looking product
reviews.reviewText: Easy to keep clean. Light and easy to store. Works great! Burners have plenty of BTUs.
